static SignalHandler * GetInstance ()

Detailed Description

SignalHandler is the connection between the APOXI MessageRouter and the protocol stack.

void SignalHandler::PostMessage (  const MessageReferrer &  msg_ref  )  [virtual]
 

PostMessage converts the APOXI-message which is wrapped by MessageReferrer into an SDL-signal and sends this to the stack.

Reimplemented from ExternalCommunicationHandler.

void SignalHandler::RouteData (  const AbstractExternalData &  external_data  )  [virtual]
 

RouteData converts incoming SDL-signals into APOXI-messages and routes them to the APOXI-applications.

Reimplemented from ExternalCommunicationHandler.
